segments.text: Yeah , it's really cute . But why a monkey suit ? Is Hello Kitty having an identity complex ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , she's wearing my Chinese zodiac sign .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You were born in the year of the monkey ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all ! That explains everything !
segments.speaker: S1
